snippet.title: Zelda Master Of Time - OoT ROMHACK 5 Months Anniversary - DL LINK - DEMO
snippet.description:
last update 3/31/2019

patch dl link:
https://www.mediafire.com/file/quedbdn8796220t/Master_of_time_-_5monthsanniversary1.0.bps/file
You need the 1.0 version of OoT

Pastebin for more:
https://pastebin.com/iB8ycnap

Use file 2 or 3
Feel free to give any feedback that can improve the game :)


Known issues:
crash when die in some maps
gold skultulla respawn
Biggoron sword is the knife
The owl stop field's music
all texture glitch
Fishing music
weird transition for grotto to field.
useless BK in fire temple

Thanks to :
ghost for lot of thing, specially the sound track
Nokaubure for a lot of help
dezzival for lot of betatest and motivation
MikusPlaysGames for betatest
ostrealava for help me to start 
DarthDub,z64offline,MelonSpeedruns,CDi-Fails,Zel,CholoDroid and probably others for help
HylianModding discord,where you can find the OoT romhack projects

Tools used :
- SharpOcarina 
https://hylianmodding.com/Thread-SharpOcarina-1-0-Tool-to-create-custom-maps
- Ocarina of Time Text Editor
https://github.com/Sage-of-Mirrors/Ocarina-Text-Editor/
- SceneNavi
https://www.romhacking.net/utilities/1013/
- Sketchup for making maps
- Seq64
https://github.com/sauraen/seq64

info:
https://hylianmodding.com/
https://wiki.cloudmodding.com/
https://sites.google.com/site/deathbasketslair/zelda/ocarina-of-time/instrument-lists

ressources:
https://www.spriters-resource.com/
https://www.models-resource.com/
https://www.vgmusic.com/
http://en.midimelody.ru/
http://www.mirsoft.info/gamemids-archive.php


contact:
discord or youtube

sound track:
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLfBIik-g05PI1qMfQPO8flH7bpMKLOUxQ
